name: Chess ∘
description:
Play the best free chess game ! Play with your friends or versus a strong game engine !

Enjoy unlimited games and improve your chess rating with tens of level and a powerful computer opponent. Unlock your inner chess master today!

The game engine is based on Stockfish !
Stockfish is one of the strongest chess engines in the world. It is also much stronger than the best human chess grandmasters.

Features:
- 2 players modes and 1 VS Computer
- Strong game engine
- Many level from rookie to world champion !
- Full statistics
- Change your board and pieces !


CONTACT

Please feel free to contact us at support@greenpandagames.com if you encounter any problem regarding this app.
